Metadata.title: VOTO - Voting made easy
Metadata.description: Evaluate the election manifestos and find out which party suits you best.

ShareDrawer.systemModalDescription: Evaluate the election manifestos and find out which party suits you best.
ShareDrawer.title: Your personal VOTO code
ShareDrawer.description: Your ratings can be accessed for using the code above. You can save the link to the ratings by using the "Share" button below and view your result again.

Intro.introOneTitle: Learn more about current topics and discover who suits you best!
Intro.introOneDescription: To find out which {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {candidates and parties} other {parties}} align with your views, you can answer up to **{numberOfTheses, plural, =1 {# statement} other {# statements}}**. The {matchType, select, candidates {candidates} candidates_and_parties {candidates and parties} other {parties}} in the election "{electionTitle} - {electionSubtitle}" have done so as well.
Intro.introTwoDescription: If a topic is especially important to you, you can mark it with the star symbol. This statement will be **counted twice as much**.
Intro.introThreeDescription: Using the **timeline**, you can easily **navigate** through the statements. For the ones you've already answered, your response will appear inside the circle. Tapping on a circle takes you to the respective statement so you can re-evaluate it.
Intro.introFourTitle: Your matches for the upcoming election.
Intro.introFourDescription: Once you've answered enough statements, you'll see your results. Here you can find out which party and candidate you **agree with the most**. You can also get an overview of all parties/candidates and read their **explanations** for each statement.

ThesisCard.starDisabledExplanation: You cannot weight any more theses as the maximum has been reached. However, you can change your weights later on the result page.

BreakDrawer.title: Stopover
BreakDrawer.descriptionSkip: You have completed {completedTheses, plural, =1 {# statement} other {# statements}} and can now jump directly to the result, although the result may be less accurate.
BreakDrawer.descriptionContinue: To improve the calculation, you can answer {remainingTheses, plural, =1 {# more thesis} other {# more theses}}. Your result will be more accurate and you'll learn more about different topics.

ThesesResultCarousel.useVOTOSort: Use your VOTO for sorting instead
